Full series here -- https://nhentai.net/g/236546/ -- While not translated there is an excellent description provided by https://nhentai.net/users/82998/acs100death in the comments for all eight chapters. -- For anyone hating NTR? All three of these bitches were sluts to begin with. So cheating/netorare is a bit of a stretch in my opinion. They were already whores. There is even a happy ending believe it or not. Of course its an emotional roller coaster ride to get there.
